text:
"Madannnnn chopraaaaaa hahhahahahahhaa", ye raat to nhi hi bhulunga.
The Sutradhar Shukla ko is nana ka namaskaar. Sanskari, satire, sarvgyaan, sarvgun sampann shukla!
waah kya upadhiyan di hai maine. 
1st year galaxy ki yahi sabse acchi baat rahi ki terese mulakat ho gyi, nhi to college ke kisi mod pe na milte shayad. Tu gyaani, main agyaani, tu grounded aur main asman me udta panchi, tu practical to main khayali pulao pakane wala aadmi. kahi mel hi nhi hai. meri taarif me bolu to main dancer aur tu nhi : ). ab tere se itte sare gun lene hai to mulakat jaroori hi thi. 

bada maja aaya tere sath bhai. loki ke badday wali raat to apan dono ke tamashe avismarniya (halaanki yaad kuch bhi nhi :) ). gyaan ki dhara bhi tujhse hkar pehle mujhpe padti thi, ki bc nana ko clear ho gaya to samjhlo nukkad janta tak pahuch gaya. The savage sutradhar "khair aapse to ummed bhi nhi hai, nana jara TV lagana".
bhai 3rd year wale play me to maja hi aagaya. kya kya imprompt maare jaa rahe hai bhaaii. beech stage pe kahi has na du ye darr tha. wo putla hasa nhi to "tum meri baat aaj kal sun nhi rahe ho", bhaai sahaab kuch bhii. but jo bhi tha accha tha bhaai <3

badi joro shoro se mehnat karo aur IAS ban jaao, fir momo jaisi 10 milengi. bas dua ke sath bubbye, shabb khair, raam- raam. <3
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth

text:
Chalo hum bhi mention kar hi dete hai ki bhai ki DP me dusre hum hai aur hamara naam likha hai hamari cap pe  'N' for NANA. Aishwarya bhaaaii, the 'DEB' specialist. Bhai tu ek hi baar bolta tha aur wo bhi to the point bc. udta teer bhi nhi, teer nikla aishwarya ki kaman se aur ghus gaya jahan ghusana tha. teri chhavi to dimaag me wahi hai, sala thand me bhi half pant pehn kar aur shawl odkar ghumta hua aadmi. club ka koi bhi kaam ho, hum saare bc khush ho ya dukhi ho, tera sath to har jagah raha hi hai.

Meri maari to hai hi tune bahut, lekin IIT roorkey me jo pakadwaya bc, tera call nhi aata to logo ko kaano kaan khabar nhi hoti. tab to laga aishwarya bc mc harami, but abhi lagta hai  ki tune hi to kaam asaaan kiya <3. jab bhi koi problem janmi, koi na koi solution to aishwarya ne diya samjho. koi kaam karne ke liye mujhe chadhaya bhi tune hi hai ki "abe nana tum chapu ho, 15 ke pass tum jaaoge". convince to karhi leta tha kisi bhi baat pe. 

Ostwal ke room me chicken ki party, shukla ka chicken khana, mime madhu ki workshop aur use wapas bhejne ka locha, antaragnii ki BTyaan, senior-junior ke masle, hall12 ki bakchodiyaan (haa haan DJ khalid bhi), volleyball (main bhi khela hu bahut bar bhai), inn saari yaadonn ke liye thanks bhaiii <3. Bas college ke akhiri dino me bhi jud jaata to gham na hota ki last bye bolna reh gaya. 
all the best bhai aage aane wali har chunauti ke liye.

- "nana MC" (mujhse mulakaat to tu inhi shabdo se karta tha) 
- Y17 Fakr hai ! (iska shrey to tera hi hai)
aur haan agli baar OAT me har angle se photo lenge bc, cameraman Varun "dominating" jain ke sath
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth

text:
Nareda birooooo...
wingie to nhi but teri wing ka hi koi hissa hu lekin mujhe hissa banane wale kisso me tera hissa bhi khass hai <3. Galaxy ke wajah se mulakat hui aur mechbross tak sath chalta gaya. sabse jyada chilll insaan, tashreef fatke 4 ho jaaye lekin maje karna jarrori hai x). aise hi haste muskurate aage badho bhai, aur Aspirant se IAS ban jaao. yaha to apne jitne course nikle Mechbros ke bharose! bhagwaan kare tujhe aur mech ke courses na karne pade. now you are out of the hell. You are a freee man bagchi!.  waise to thodi nirasha thi ki tere jaate waqt mil nhi paaya, but wo hall9 ki party thhoda dukh kam kar deti hai. koi na!
All the best bhaii!
jaahan bhi jaaye mahoul banate rahiyo!
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth

text:
"bhai nana bahut MC hai iski shakal pe mat jaao", pata nhi tujhe mujhse aisi konsi MCgiri dikhti thi. Aur thake haare tere wing me aake tere hi bed pe sona sahi lagta tha mujhe, rajai bakchod thi bc. apna jyada sa samay to 1st year ka beeta hai sath me, bc chhota sa baccha bade aadmi ke peeche chappal leke gaaliyaan bakte hue bhaag raha hai, wo to bhai yaad kar karke hasi aati hai. antaragni kari sath me aur mehengi kitabo ka chuna lagwa liya, abhi tak matter solve hua ya nhi pata nhi. chota packet bada dhamaka hai tu bhai!. galaxy me tera "ECS me G**d phategi, F lagega sabka bc" kehke darata rehta tha bc. aur orientation ka tera wo dialogue "hey dude, whats your problem man?" bhai tere se sahi to koi nhi karta x). saale chote se sharir me kitta ghussa bhar ke rakhta hai, yaad hai drameve 1 me 2ndyear me bc tune 1 bacche ko bhaga diya tha, wo aaj tak tujhe kosta hoga. 

chal jo bhi hai, bada accha banda hai tu lekin MC to tu bhi hai. choti umar me bade karname kar kar ke tum aise hi naam kamate raho. aur ummid hai fir mulakat hogi, tab tak ke liye alvida mitra
<3
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth

text:
Hitesh bhaiiiiâ¤
Aage jake kabhi bhi agar main college ke baare me yaad karunga, to pehla tu hi yaad aayega. Bhai har saaal room mate. Bade bhai ki tarah hai yaar tu. Meri kisi bhi baat pe comment to karta hi tha. Kuch galat karu to tokta bhi tha. Darwaza khula reh gaya to tu galiyayega, pankha shuru reh gaya to tu galiyaega, kuch samaan nhi milraha to tu galiyayega ðŸ˜‚, tere se behes karne me lekin maza bahut aata tha.

1st year me sabse pehle Rahul aur terese mila, tujhe dekhke ke to laga hi tha ki bada chaapu aur talented roommate mila per bc ESC aate aate pata chala, are ye to apna hi bhai haiðŸ˜‚. "Esc is not our cup of tea". Aur bhai wo lab me variable assigning wali bakchodi. A ne B ko de diya to A khali ho gayaaðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£, bhai kitta hase the yaar ispeeðŸ˜‚ abhi bhi yaad karke hasi aati hai. 
Ek din aise hi ghumne nikal gaye, kya karna hai to garden ghumke aate, waha kheeche photos pata nhi kaha chale gaye. 1st year aisehi haste khelte nikal gaya. 2nd year tak tere hariyanvi aur punjabi gaano ki aadat lag gayi. Aur wo video to gajab ti.. "kya? Mera selection ho gaya hai" ðŸ˜‚. Har choti choti bakchodiyan yaad rahengi bhai. 3rd year me to bhai ne sachme proof kardiya ki chaapu to bhaiya hum hai, phir chahe wo sports me ho ya software me intern. Aur abhi to tu badi chalaang hi laga liya. 
Bahut sahi hai bhai tu, apni dhun me jeene wala, thoda selfish thoda determined, aur bahut sara humor ðŸ˜‚. Ummid hai ki fir milenge kahi to aur jaroor milenge. Stay happy as you are. Love you bhai â¤
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth

text: le badhwa di deadline, tu bhi kya yaad rakhegi
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth

text:
Loki man, bhai bada hi gajab aadmi hai yaar tu. Teri acting styles ke to bhai sabhi deewane hai aur improptu ke to alag se. ''Aur Chapu nana''  keh kehke lagta hai nana ke saamne chapu tune hi lagwaya.

pehli mulakat bhai apni 1st year galaxy, kya kya rap aur gaane ka remix banake laata tha (kuch kuch original bhi the, mana nhi kar raha) tab laga tha ki haan ye banda hall2 dramatics to bulandiyo tak pahuchayega. teri acting aur imprompts ka ek example yaad aaraha hai bhai, summer me apne ko judiciary pe nukkad banane bola tha. tu sutradhar bana tha, tera wo beech beechme 'suneil shety', nikal aana, wo thanos ke snap wala idea bhi tera hi tha. katai cringe bhai. fir play me to tumne acting ke jalwe dikyae hi "yaseen, ye tumhara hi kaam tha na". waise to play maine kam hi kiye hai, but ye accha hai ki 'cheema' (I guess chit-pinjar me yahi naam tha tera) ke sath me stage share karne ka mauka mila.

Apart from dramatics, terese gyaan ki baate bhi bahut mili. bc tu aur shukla milke pehle flow mere ko hi to samjhate the (dindor ko bracket me daal leta hu). mere sath aisa to kabhi hi hua ki kuch samajh nhi aaya to tere se 10 baar poocha aur tune politely nhi bataya ho. badi acchi acchi yaadein hai tere sath. aur unhi me ek hai bhai tera birthdayyyyyy yaaar. wo to special meri aur shukla ki hi treat thi samajhne me koi harz nhi. wo moments to bhule se nhi bhulunga. baaki to 3rd year galaxy wale din bhi bade majedaar the (loki man captain america bc :)))) 

khub aage badho bhai, jahan bhi jaaoge dhoom machaoge ye to sure hai. baaki milenge to sahi, aur milne ki jagah bambai ho too aur jyada accha hai. All the best bhaii <3.
- chapu nana
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth

text:
Sahil khaann, sale tumhare karyakaal me dram trophy jeeti gayi, garv hona chahiye tumhe. Aur tumhe gaurvanvit mehsus karane me thoda yogdaan hamara bhi hai bhaiðŸ˜. Diplomatic nonsense likhte ho, lekin baato me jaadu to hai tumhare. Ek din mujhe aur ostwal ko ostwal ke room pe intern na lagne pe motivate kar rhe the yaad hai, josh bhar diya tha tumne, kya kare insaani fitrat hai 1 din ke baad josh khatam ho jaata haiðŸ˜‚. Baaki bhai tu to hamesha se hi ek samajhdaar insaan laga hai. Stable minded. All the best tumhe apne har laksh ke liye.
Aur bc uss din wale joke se offend nhi hona (nhi hi hua i guess), kyunki aise to aate rahenge bhai.
Good luck president!
- Nana
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth

text:
Ostwal bhaaaiiii.... tere sath ahi to waise bahut saari yaadein hai, per mujhe sabse accha lagta tha tere sath medly khadi karna, kya naye naye ideas laata tha bhai tu, " ye step itta hard kyu raknha hai?" aur tu "easy wala karne me kya maza". matlab sasti cheezo ka shouk to pehle se hi nhi tha, karna hai to bada karo. waise to shuru sehi chalu karna chaiye, per bc jangle java wala choreo karne me fati bhi thi lekin maja bhi bahut aaya tha, aur tune kaha tha "ye to nhi kat raha nana apna, kyunki apne siwa karne wala hi koinhi hai".

Antaragni se shuru karte. "na tere ghar me bijli hai na mere ghar me paani, raining cham cham ho rahi hai hum pe ye pareshani" x) xD ohhhhh bhaaaai tha to ye katai zeherrr, usi antargni ke dauran doaa pe bakchodi, chaukhat pe padhna, tera doaa pe ronaa bhaaiiiii "koi kuch karne bolta hai, koi kuch, ek jaisa bolo to sba kardu" aur laga ronee. wo rone se lekar abhi rulane tak ka tera safar bhai Salute. wo NSS ka nukkad bc bio ke exam ke beech me kar diya, usme bhi "oohohoh" ka choreoo, bc abhi hasi aati hai, but as you said "apna batch hi raste pe karke aaya hai bc", feeling proud! yaad hai wwahi bc tu end ki shayri bhul gaya aur mujhe nagada bajate bajate pooch raha hai, bhai moment tha yaar wo bhi x) .

orientation ki to baat hi alag hai. jitni marawayi, kabhi nhi bhulenge. Antargni ke apne choreo bhaaii, "hum 2no hai alag alag" sale original step hi wo vulgar tha. waha se to bhai play me chala gaya, aur uske baad jo tune Anand se leke Ramdas tak ki progress ki bhai usko to 21 topo ki salaami. 
galaxy me bhi bade maje kiye yaar. saifi ka play, fir apan ka 3rd year wala to bakchood. 3 run through me hi chaap diya. (director ko jyada mehnat nhi karwaai xp). Coordi tenure ki to kya hi baat kare, jab sabse bada kaand hua, tab to apan 2no hi so rahe the (IITB). lekin saaare utaar chadhav dekh liye, aur kuch majak mastiyon ke sath jeet bhi gaye. 

ye saari to bas dramatics ki baate hui, yaadein tobahut saari hai. lekin iske alawa bhi to mech ke courses nikalne me kitna waqt bitaye hai bhai. aur har baar ek chiiz common thi. "ostwal hai, sab kuch ho jaayega". wo first year me NCL me sath jaake padhna, 2nd year tak library aur 3rd year to wing me hi chata tha sab kuch. 

Golden ka to pata nhi, but you are a man of good heart. log izzat nhi kama paate, waha tune logo ka bharosa kama liya. Apna branch, hall,dramatics, to same hai hi but apni shuruwaat bhi same thi, fir wo club interest ho ya CPI. lekin yahaan aate aate raaste alag ho gaye. fir main kabhi iss baare me sochta hu ki kya reasons rahe honge, to bas wahi moments yaad aate. tera na gaali dene se lekar gaali diye bina na bolne ka safar, ki kaise sabse alag opinion hone ke bawajood bhi tu apne opinion pe khada rehta tha, kuch alag karne ki chah rakhta tha aur uske parinaamo se ladne ki himmat bhi, mehnat to teri badi hai hi, lekin teri will power usse bhi badi. aur abhi teri inhi sab baato ko atmasssat karne ki koshish karunga, aur ummid karunga ki aage aur acchi acchi chheeze tere se seekhne mile

Aage ke liye all the best bhai!
Love you <3
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth

text:
Hey Palak
Bas isi  naam se bulaya hai, Moti kehne ka kabhi awasar nhi milaðŸ˜‚. Pehli mulakat i guess Doaa canteen pe. Kabhi bhi plan ban gaya aur chale raat me maggi khane. Nss ke nukkad me jo gandh machake aaye the use to kaise hi bhul sakte. Uske baad wo summer ki dance workshop! Achhi thi, uski videos abhi bhi hai mere pass, mere choti behen dekh ke bolti hai ye moti kon haiðŸ˜‚ (not me againðŸ˜œ). Baaki aage badhte badhte kahi hume bhool na jaana.
All the best!
Tumhara shubh chintak Nana.
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth

text:
Rahul bhai, tere sath bhaai acche acche moments 1st year ke hi hai, kyunki uske baad to main khud hi jagah pe nhi rehta tha. koi to TV show dekha karte the bc, roj 8 bajne ka intezaar karte the. tu hai punjabi per punjabi wale gun nhi tere me, lekin chota packet bada dhamaka hai tu. aur tere pass to koi dobara doubt poochne jaaye na, dusri baar me hi chilla deta tha "sale itna easy to hai". tere karan TA bhi badi assani se gujra tha, main to subah aake tera chhapta hi tha. tere aage ke safar ke liye bahut  bahut good luck.
-jald hi milenge <3
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth

text:
Yo Ramoleeeee.
Waise to baate kam hoti hai, lekin 1st year bhi to memory ka hissa hai hi. aur teri peeth par hi to 1st year ka nukkad khada hua, aur thoda bahut meri peeth par bhi. but you are a star performer bro. 1st year me wo foyer ki dewaar ke sahare sona to hameha yaad rahega.bhai khade khade so jaata tha tu.
abhi to bhai content nikalte raho, aur manoranjan karte raho. ummid hai fir kabhi kahi milenge, tab tak ke liye alvida bhai!
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth

text:
Bhai kisi adbhut chhez ko dekh ke jaise halki si khushi milti hai na, waisa hai tu mere liye. Apni yadein jyada nhi, apni baate jyada nhi, mulakate jyada nhi, sath me kiye aise kaam bhi jyada nhi. Per jab bhi tujhse baat karta tha, accha lagta tha. Bada kind aur pyara band hai bhai tu. Tere room pe kam hi samay bitaya, jisme se ek wo 1st year me shashank ke sath baith ke teri dehradun wali  yadein aur dehradun wali ki baate ðŸ˜œ shamil hai.
Memories kam to hai lekin itni dhundhli nhi ki dhue ki tarah gayab ho jaaye. Ummid hai kahi to milenge aur jaroor milenge. Apni muskurahat banaye rakhna aur tu to hai hi chaapu all the best ko bhi sharam aayegi ki isko bol diyaðŸ˜‚.
Love you broo.â¤
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth

text:
"Nana bhai chal scene banate na", "bc nana tu kitta fraud maarta hai bhai", "aaja chal aaj chicken khate","oo nana yaar chud gaye yaar","9 baj gaye kya ðŸ˜‚", "hello nana, haan uthja bsdk class nhi aana kya", aur bhi kitte sare dialogues hai bhai, bas ab bolne wala tu nhi hoga. Are bc "joru ka gulam" to reh hi gaya ðŸ˜‚. 
Ab nostalgic hona hi hai to chal shuruwat se hi shuru karte.

Tujhe to pehli baar seedha 1st semester ki antaragni practice me ostwal ke sath choukhat pe hi mila. (Har baar ki tarah Drameve 1 me bhi tere pass koi khass role to tha nhi jo yaad rakhuðŸ¤£ðŸ˜œ). Roj raat me padhne aata tha ya antaragni me kuch karne ka mauka mil jaaye isi bahane shayad. Aur akhir bhai ne mime kar hi diiðŸ‘ðŸ‘. Uske baad jo pehla nukkad sath kiya to tune itna chaapa ki "you blew my mind" se nawaza gaya ðŸ˜œ

2nd sem me to main khud hi gayab tha, LEKIN "UPSC nikal lenge naaaaaa" ye nukkad me dialogue sunke judge to kar liya tha ki bc ye dindor bada hawasi haiðŸ¤£. Galaxy to uss saal ki bhaisaahab. Dubey ka wo gaana "samay ke pahiyo ki pagdandi" ise sahi se gaane ka bhar tune apne sir liya aur khud hi hag diya bcðŸ˜‘.

Ab aate hai Summer play pe. Bhai practice me maje bahut kiye. Tera dance dekhke to abhi bhi hasta hu ðŸ˜‚, bhadda nachta hai bsdk, 2-4 acche steps seekhle. Uske baad wo exercises, bc jyadatar skits me tu hi sath raha hai. Aur play se bedhalat me bhi sath hi. Chalo ye bhi theek tha.

Fir 2nd year antaragni bhaii, bc saare log play me cast apan dono hall se nikalte samay sochte ki aaj katiyaar exercise me gandi na phade ðŸ¤£, but katiyaar to apna kaam bakhubi nibha leta. Aur tu hisaab rakhta tha ki nana ne aaj kitta fraud maara ðŸ˜…. Aur bhai acads ki baat kare to wo apne to sath hi me uthte aur ghatte the.

Galaxy ka zeher yaad hai "sapna toota to hai dil yunhi jalta hai" ye bhi tere room pe banaye the, munna, circuit aur anand bhaiðŸ˜‚. Usi galaxy me apan jhagad bhi liye, thodi mukka laat bhi ho hi jaani chahiye thi, dher sari yadon me ek ye bhi shamil ho jaati. 

Aur sirf dramatics se related nhi yaar, tere sath to baaki pal bhi maje me hi gujre hai. Bc wo shukla tu aur main wo venky ka subject padhte hue bakchodi kar rhe, kyunki pata tha ostwal sab sambhal lega. Wo loki k badday pe asmaani sair aur wo DJ khalid wala moment bhai avismarniya.

Aur bhi bahut hai bhai, agar jaane se ek din pehle bhi bata deta na, poora 4 saal recap karlete hall 12 me. Chill hai, but bada dariyadil insaan hai tuâ¤, aise hi udarta banaye rakh aur gyaan dete na main accha lagta na tu, to bas jahan jaaye waha swag aur mahol banate rehna.
Love you bhai â¤
- Fraudy nana.
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth

text:
Barwal bsdk..... jab bhi milta tha aise hi greet karta tha. Aur teri wajah se jo change aya na life me, uske liye bhaut bahut thanks bhaiiâ¤. Apni yaadein to bole to bas 2nd year hi hai bhai! But worth it! Aur sabse jyaada yaadgaar to apna drameve 1 ka jhantule jhatak! Aur 2nd scene bhi bhai. Antaragni ki bkchodiyaaan, roorkey ki trip bhai memorable. 
Aise hi haste muskurate reh bhai, aur aage ke liye good luck!
Love you!
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth

text:
Varun "dominating" Jain, jabse main janta hu tabse to mere mann me teri poori image ye shabd bol deta hai. Teri gaaliyaan ho ya satire, shikar to jyadatar main hi bana hu. Kabhi teri sarcsatic baato pe hasa hu to kabhi ghussa bhi aaya hai, lekin ab baato se tera mukablato karne se raha, to gaali de kar hi mann halka karliya. Waise ek baar to awaaz uthayi thi (IITB me dance competetion se pehle), tu bina kuch bole chala gaya, tab maine socha ki play ke liye ostwal ko manaya jaaye ya sorry ke liye Varun ko, choodo yaar Dance pe focus karte hai :)) . 

NSS me dekha tha pehli baar, aur ye shant sa dikhne wala banda 3 saal me itna keher dhayega iska andaza bhi lagana mushkil. Dram eve 1 me hi pata chala ki bhai sabko sath leke chalne walo me se hai, fir chahe gaiyanke hi kyu naho. aur to aur bhai gaana bhi gaate hai, bhai scene bhi banate hai, bhai gaana bhi likhte hai, bhai instrument bhi baja lete hai, aur bhai ka sense of humor to gazab ka. Itna Multifaced chaapu character hai tu <3

Antaragni, InterIIT, coordinators jahan bhi tere sath gaya, khud bulli hone ke alawa ;] jo jo choti moti bakchodiyan ki  mast thi. jitni bhi parties hui hai, log bhand hoke bhi maje nhi kar paate, kyunki waha bhi initiate karne wala tu hi. hall 2 me dindor ka room aur hall 12 me tera, bas yahi hai jahaan phir kabhi mauka mile na, to saare yaar milkar ek baar fir DJ khalid ban jaau :)). Coordi wale tenure me kitne bhi utaar chadhav hasi majac dukh dard hue sabme tu sthir tha, strong tha, calm tha. Aur ye acchi cheez hai to seekhne ki koshish kar rahahu. 

Tera BT wala chehra jyada nhi dekha lekin jab dekha to fatt jaati thi. IITB se laut ke baad aur abhi college chhodne ke wo moments unhi me shamil hai. upar se bhale hi kathor hai lekin mann me koi baat nhi rakhta. 

Inter IIT ki wo baat to kaise bhul sakta hu, maine kurta nhi laaya, to tu galiyaya "nana bc tune kurta nhi laaya to tune laaya kya hai" ----"shoooooeeeeessss" :). Aise hi saare khushi aur dukhi wale palo ka hissa tu in 4salo me mere sath bana, uske liye thanksss bhai <3. 

college ke akhiri dino me bhi aur maje karne the, but kya kare kismat me nhi the, aur haa ksi pe taunt maarna aur maze lena ye hall 12 me rehne ka parinaam hi hai shayad, aur pata nhi kyu ye main dindor pe hi azma ke dekh leta hu. wo akhri raat me photoshoot ha idea bhaai. jaate jaate apan sab bas yaadein sametne ki koshish kar rhe the. bas fir kabhi milne ka mauka mile, to tera roomm ho, saare yaar ho, tu dabbe pe gaana chalaye aur sab bas aise hi kho jaaye....

Alvida bhai <3, All the besttt
- fraudy nana
- Non(proactive) nana
author: Piyush Sunil Samarth
